name: lastlarf
text: Oh fuck I hate it when guys have to do a thing.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, mikeronomicon, NotGodot, DiamondMonster, unquotable, NDCaesar, atticusonline, the_dingle, littlefatdog, goodgravy, Pigs)

name: dwilow
text: I'm pretty sure that the person who hands him the dinner invitation is some sort of lagomorph in a beanie.

name: fattypneumonia
text: "I'm a lagomorph, Sam.  Look it up!"

name: panthera3000
text: Chubby for Sam & Max reference

name: shutup_shutup
text: a coat over a turtle neck will always make me think first of Fry from Futurama and second of Carl Sagan.  I'll try and squeeze Ray into this process in the future.

name: chaesar
text:
The weeping mucus man would enjoy your presence for dinner:

Turn to Page 35 if you accept the invitation.
Turn to Page 50 if you go home instead.

name: petitegitan
text: Pg 35: He touches you and you die.  You die of horror.

name: hikikomori
text: Pg 50: You go home but he is in your house.  He touches you and you die.  You die of horror.

name: cailetshadow
text: You turn to page 50. There is no page 50. Then you feel a clammy, trembling hand touch your shoulder.

name: luckypyjamas
text: that made me shiver

name: wittyname
text: Each of those were chubbied for greatness.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i concur!

name: onepapertiger
text: ditto

name: swatson
text:
I laughed so hard it started to sound like ray's "Abloo bloobloo"

Thank You.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
okay i love that avatar

kudos

name: unsentletter
text: Ohhhhh SHHHIIIIIIIIIT

name: atticusonline
text: Probably the greatest string of chubbies known to man.

name: soticoto
text:
Page 300 : Finally he stops moving, and you breathe a sigh of relief knowing it is all over.
Also, you know that you cheated. There is basically no way to reach this outcome in the adventure and you have been caught cheating.

Turn to Page 1 if you hang your head in shame and start over.
Turn to Page 142 if you just don't care.

name: johnnyc
text: Page 142: He is on page 142. He touches you and you die. You die of horror.

name: soticoto
text:
The horror.

The horror.

*Dies*

name: ssddr
text: Even his tie is melting

name: stuart
text: Look at ray's eyebrows on that last panel. The back of his head , man.

name: rachel
text: wow man holy crap now look at ch's eyebrows in the last panel

name: stuart
text: He's passed from baseline remorse to being slightly ticked off Ray isn't sitting down.

name: lrosetw8
text:
I was looking at the second panel of this right while the end of the first movement of Brahms Symphony No. 4 was playing on my iTunes.

It was... wow. If you have that piece somewhere in your house, man, do it.

name: soticoto
text:
Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata, First Movement.

Do it.

name: juanclaudius
text: I'm wondering if there's any significance to his being in seat Z-1. Maybe I'm looking for references in the long places, but that seems like an Onstad move.

name: cailetshadow
text: I think what it means is that Ray is sitting as far away from Cartilage Head as he possibly can.

name: vandenbos
text: I can't decide whether that makes Z-1 the best or worst seat in the house.

name: shakey
text: and the number 1 is always an isle seat. which is some good detail, as the usher walks by Ray to hand him the invite.

name: deusoma
text: Alt Text: "!"

name: mike24
text: ray is in the last row

name: c_dizzle
text: Cartilage Head looks like a misplaced Dali painting. Poor guy, no wonder he feels so distraught.

name: daidai
text: That, and his face has no bones.

name: direhaggis
text:
Damn. Ray gets no complimentary gallon of single malt to wash down that dude's complexion? That is directly bozack killing.

Also is that a flop-eared rabbit dressed in a cardigan with a kippa/yarmulke in panel 3?

name: king-jim
text: Looks like an orthodox beagel with nasty psoriasis in an itchy woolen suit jacket.

name: woodenteeth
text: With a stunted right arm.

name: philophobe
text:
Holy Friggin' God Christ I only just noticed Cartilage Head's pupils in the second-to-last panel.

Gelatinous effluvia.
